Rulings.Base: 1. The effect of this card to destroy the opponent's monster is activated as an Effect Monster's effect.\n2. It will not apply if this card is Summoned by "Magical Hats".\n3. If another Trap Card Summoned as a monster by "Magical Hats" battles, this card's effect will activate.
